lines.text: Looks like you found the fucking "Off" switch.
What da' ya' mean she's activated?!
Well this is quite some toy you have yourselves here gentlemen. I suppose you want me to put it back in its box.

[showing Eve VIII his penis]
Say hellooooooo!
And each would have an epitaph. He died for his country because he didn't fucking listen!
I don't know where shes going to go next, okay? I can only give you some clues, after the events.
Yeah, well there might be a few more events before the nights over, Miss Simmons!
